transcript:
Customer: [Music]

Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji haan.
Executive: Good evening sir, kal aapne call kiya tha kya?
Customer: Haan haan madam call kiya tha madam.
Executive: Sir maine bhi kal aapko call kiya tha but aapne receive nahi kiya tha. Aaj fir aapne mere number pe na karke 9696 pe kar diya tha. Abhi
Customer: Haan haan madam.
Executive: Sir aapne mujhe kyun nahi call kiya aapne?
Customer: Nahi nahi ispe
Executive: Karenge toh madam sabko pata chalega na ki complaint hua hai.
Executive: Woh calls toh mere paas hi aate hai sir. 9696 pe aap karte hai aap mere personal number pe karte hai. Saari calls mere paas hi aati hai. Bataiye abhi kya issue aa raha hai?
Customer: Issue madam ye aa raha hai ki wool mein jo hum aapko kitni baar bole hai ki mujhe wool mein chahiye.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Lead jo hai lead jo hai wool mein chahiye humko aur wool mein lead aa nahi rahi hai. Aap dekh lijiye kis kis matlab aap ek baar check kariye toh mera.
Executive: Haan sir.
Executive: Ek kaam karo aap mera number check kar lijiye. Main aapki quality ka dekhti hu aur pehle aap mera number check kar lijiye. Aap mujhe call kijiyega kuch bhi hoga. Main aapka account manager main abhi aapka check karungi. Kiski lead aa rahi hai?
Customer: Hmm?
Executive: Aur kiski lead aa rahi hai carpet ki?
Customer: Haan haan wool carpet mein humko chahiye madam lekin isme wool ka koi nahi aa raha hai. Dekhiye pata nahi kaha se multi colour aa ja raha hai, cotton ka aa ja raha hai. Jo humko chahiye wo mil nahi raha hai. Toh jaise agar kisi ko hum whatsapp pe share bhi karenge toh usko jo chahiye rahega wo toh jisko jo chahiye rahega wo wahi lega na. Mere kehne se wool toh kharidne nahi lagega. Wool mein usko carpet chahiye agar usko jo jo chahiye carpet jis variety ka carpet chahiye wo toh usi carpet ka dhundhega na.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai main ek baar search karke dekhti hu ki wool ka carpet hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aapne kya likha hai kya aapne wool carpet wala product kya aapne aisa product kya add kiya kya wool wala?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Mujhe aapki aawaz clear nahi aa rahi madam.
Executive: Haan main keh rahi hu ye wool wala carpet aapne yaha add kiya tha aisa product?
Customer: Haan madam.
Executive: Uski category nahi aa rahi. Theek hai maine search kiya pani Delhi bhi karte hai abhi Mumbai bhi dikhaungi.
Customer: Madam humari category ka hum jitna bhi jitna bhi add kiye hai sab woolen ka hi add kiye hai.
Executive: Category kaha se nahi add kiye?
Executive: Nahi nahi maine search kiya hai category maine add kar diya maine search bhi kiya hai. Abhi yaha pe show ho rahi hai ek toh carpet Delhi ki hai aur ek yaha ki hai.
Customer: Mumbai ki hai. Open kijiye IndiaMART.
Customer: Haan open kar liye hai.
Customer: Aur madam jo inquiry aa rahi hai koi kaam ki inquiry nahi hai toh inquiry kyun aa rahi hai?
Executive: Inquiry ka kya hua?
Customer: Inquiry jaise madam jo kisi kaam ki inquiry nahi hai toh kyun aa rahi hai inquiry isko band kariye.
Executive: Inquiry toh aapko aa toh rahi hai sir dekhiye inquiry kam ho gayi hai abhi thodi. Living room carpet ka aaya tha plus polyester carpet ka aaya tha. Inquiry thodi si kam ho gayi hai. Ye jo jyada aapki complaint hai but thodi inquiry kam ho gayi hai.
Customer: Inquiry wo nahi bata rahe hai matlab jaise hum keh rahe hai jaise inquiry kisi kaam ki nahi toh inquiry kyun aa rahi hai?
Executive: Aur acha kisi kaam ki nahi hai matlab kya response rahega inquiry ka exactly? Wo bhi interested nahi hai unhone inquiry dali hai uske baad fir wo bhi convert nahi ho raha hai business ke liye.
Customer: Hmm hmm business ke liye convert nahi ho raha hai matlab jab unko chahiye nahi toh inquiry kyun dal rahe hai? Aap aisa kuch kariye na jisko chahiye sirf wo inquiry dal sake.
Executive: Sir jisko sir jo actually kya hota hai buyer interested hi hote hai matlab unko interest hota hai tabhi toh suppose koi daal raha hai mujhe iski requirement hai unhone specially aapka view visit kiya hai carpet wala aur specially inquiry dali toh obviously wo interested honge tabhi toh dala unhone sir.
Customer: Madam ye bataiye humen jaise aap bata rahi hai ki matlab sabko mil raha hai business toh madam hume kyun nahi mil raha hai aap hume ye bataiye.
Executive: Aapka lead manager open kijiye zara.
Customer: Haan ji hum lead manager open karke rakhte hai.
Executive: Haan theek hai reminder ke upar jo filter hai usko uh uh theek kariye.
Customer: More karke?
Executive: Haan reminder ke upar jo filter hai maine aapko bataya tha inquiry check karna.
Customer: Haan inquiry toh check karna hum inquiry check kar rahe hai.
Executive: Haan inquiry ka mujhe screenshot bhejiye zara ki aapne kya inquiry kiya tha aur buyer ka kya response aaya hai?
Customer: Buyers ka koi response nahi hai bas wo dekh liya hai.
Executive: Sir is tarah yes all inquiries lijiye aur koi inquiry ka mujhe screenshot send kijiye whatsapp pe inquiry.
Customer: Sir theek hai madam hum aapko share kar rahe hai.
Executive: Main kal aapko do baar call ki thi but aapne receive nahi kiya sir. Aaj aapne phone bhi kiya toh 9696 pe.
Customer: Nahi madam hum aapko do baar toh call nahi kiya hai.
Customer: Hum aapko share kar diye madam dekh lijiye thoda. Whatsapp pe?
Customer: Haan madam.
Customer: Aur de?
Executive: Ji whatsapp pe connect kiya tha aapne?
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Whatsapp pe connect kiya tha aapne?
Customer: Haan whatsapp pe bhi connect kiye hai waha ka bhi screenshot denge aapko.
Executive: Okay thank you so much sir.
Customer: Ye dekhiye humare wasiya bazaar ke hi hai. Bagal ke hi hai. Hum toh fir bhi hai. Inhe koi interest nahi hai humare saath business karne mein.
Executive: Theek hai aapne whatsapp pe connect kiya sir inko?
Customer: Haan madam whatsapp pe connect kiye hai aapko whatsapp ka bhi hum screenshot de rahe hai ek minute rukiye.
Customer: Ye dekhiye yaha se bheja hai.
Executive: 15 November ko aaya tha inquiry.
Executive: Dekhiye sir inquiry mein kya hota hai ki aap unko whatsapp pe connect karke rakhiye please unko whatsapp pe feedback call karte rahiye. Ho sakta hai buyer ko abhi ek do din das inquiry dali hai ek do din free ho ke aaye fir wo kahi aur involve ho busy ho aapse baat kare.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Regarding.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Wool wala aapne search kiya abhi aapne keh rahe the aapko quality nahi aaye thi.
Customer: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Hello? Haan toh usko copy karke jo aapka product hai usko copy kijiye ek baar search kijiye. Mujhe abhi show ho rahi hai uski quality.
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Product ka naam copy karke waha pe paste kijiye.
Customer: Acha ek minute. Lijiye. Abhi aapko quality dikhi uski?
Customer: Search product pe gaye? Search kar diye. Haan wool aur carpet karke maine search kiya mujhe utne pe dikh rahi hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi madam nahi dikh raha hai.
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Dikha aapko aapne search kiya sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi madam aa nahi raha hai search kiye fir bhi nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Ek minute main show karti hu aapko main aap apni screen ka screenshot bhejti hu.
Executive: Hello dekhiye maine ye naam search kiya mujhe ye wali pallet show ho rahi hai.
Customer: Aisa toh kuch madam humare mein aaya nahi hai. Kaha se aa gaya aapne?
Executive: Naam search kijiye na jo maine naam dala hai wahi aap search kijiyega. Haan theek hai wool carpet ek minute ek minute. Ye aapka product aapne yahi naam se dala tha. Maine just copy karke paste kiya usme search mein dala. Iske niche bhi agar aap scroll karenge toh bhi is product ki valid hai.
Customer: Acha itna much call me. Haan madam aa toh gaya. Isko consume kar le?
Executive: Haan consume kar lijiye. Aur ek aur aayi hui hai all type of handmade carpet. Bhadohi ki Uttar Pradesh.
Customer: Uh madam hum inko call kar rahe hai aap thoda suniye kya kehte hai ye.
Customer: Conference kar de?
Customer: Hello?
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants wool leads, not receiving them.

- Inquiries are not converting into business.

- Inquiries are not relevant.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the customer's account.

- Executive asked to check lead manager.

- Executive asked to share screenshots of inquiries.

- Executive showed the customer how to search for wool carpets.

- Executive asked the customer to consume the leads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share screenshots on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, wool carpet, inquiries
